description: Title in this copy (front fly-leaf): Tafsīr al-Zajjāj ʻalá raʼy Ibn Abbās. ff. 244. 308 x 215; 230 x 148 mm. 21 lin. 16th cen. Brockelmann, GAL, I, 203; S I, 331. The commentary on the first sūrah begins: ... الحمد لله ... ىقول الشکر لله وهو ان صنع الخلق ومدحوه
author: ʻAbd Allāh ibn al-ʻAbbās, -688?
title: Tafsīr.
creator: ʻAbd Allāh ibn al-ʻAbbās, -688?
subject: Qurʼan—Commentaries—Early works to 1800
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
